00001 <h2>Instructions</h2>
00002 <p>
00003         Drop IUseThis either in ~/Library/Widgets/ (just for your user) or in
00004         /Library/Widgets/ (for all users of your computer. Show Dashboard,
00005         click the Plus sign to display the Widget Bar and click the widget&rsquo;s
00006         icon in the Widget Bar to open it.
00007 </p>
00008 <p class="centered">
00009         <img src="/assets/images/software/widgets/iusethis/iusethis-screenshot.png" alt="Front of IUseThis Widget" />
00010 </p>
00011 <p>
00012         Clicking on the counter will bring you to the page on iusethis.com that
00013         lists the users of the currently tracked app. Clicking on the app icon will
00014         bring you to the app homepage.
00015 </p>
00016 <p class="centered">
00017         <img src="/assets/images/software/widgets/iusethis/back.png" alt="Back of IUseThis Widget" />
00018 </p>
00019 <p>
00020         To reveal the preferences pane, click on the "i" button to flip the widget.
00021         Enter a portion of the name of the app you want to track, then press the Enter key.
00022 </p>
00023 <p class="centered">
00024         <img src="/assets/images/software/widgets/iusethis/refine.png" alt="List of applications matching your query" />
00025 </p>
00026 <p>
00027         A list with the available matches will popup. Choose an item from the list, then press OK.
00028 </p>
00029 <p>
00030         What if you want to track another app? Nothing easier. Just double click the widget and
00031         another instance will appear, ready to be configured!
00032 </p>
Generated on Sun May 4 13:26:44 2008 for Emeraldion Lodge (codename Zelda) by  1.5.5
